data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Pemagatshel with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pemagatshel, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Pemagatshel, Bhutan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Pemagatshel, Bhutan.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Pemagatshel to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Pemagatshel that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Darjee people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, you gave the church of Pemagatshel, Bhutan the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Pemagatshel, Bhutan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 23,553 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Pemagatshel words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

location.name: Pemagatshel
location.people_groups_list: Chali, Adap, Dakpa, Kachari Sonwal, Broq-Pa
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chali (1,800), Adap (300), Dakpa (4,400), Kachari Sonwal (1,100), Broq-Pa (5,600)
